Mark is passionate about working with both individuals and companies to realize their goals. His vast professional experience has equipped him with the capacity to successfully prepare and guide companies through the buying and selling process, and its transition. He is committed to supporting others in creating new possibilities and futures for themselves. His unique expertise comes from both his experience as a business consultant and from his experience as a business owner and executive. He is well-versed in retail, restaurant, manufacturing, import and distribution. Mark has assisted companies with a range of services from business acquisition and sale to the improvement of market value, organic growth and turnaround. He has worked with companies of various sizes including start-ups and well established businesses. His professional portfolio includes extensive executive and hands-on management experience, ownership and advising family-owned and operated businesses and experience with commercial real estate and business valuation. These businesses ranged from approximately $1.0 million to $450 million in revenue. Mark previously owned a wine import and distribution company and has comprehensive food and wine expertise.

Mark is passionate about working with both individuals and companies to realize their goals. His vast professional experience has equipped him with the capacity to successfully prepare and guide companies through the buying and selling process, and its transition. He is committed to supporting others in creating new possibilities and futures for themselves. His unique expertise comes from both his experience as a business consultant and from his experience as a business owner and executive. He is well-versed in retail, restaurant, manufacturing, import and distribution. Mark has assisted companies with a range of services from business acquisition and sale to the improvement of market value, organic growth and turnaround. He has worked with companies of various sizes including start-ups and well established businesses. His professional portfolio includes extensive executive and hands-on management experience, ownership and advising family-owned and operated businesses and experience with commercial real estate and business valuation. These businesses ranged from approximately $1.0 million to $450 million in revenue. Mark previously owned a wine import and distribution company and has comprehensive food and wine expertise.
